DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate antitussive ( cough-suppressing ) effect two liquid medication : combination diphenhydramine phenylephrine naturally cocoa flavoring , , dextromethorphan syrup , compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Antitussive Effect Naturally Flavored Syrup Containing Diphenhydramine , Compared With Dextromethorphan Placebo
DOC.criteria: healthy adult nonsmoker onset acute , viral upper respiratory tract infection ( common cold ) within 72 hour enrollment smoker history asthma respiratory disorder
